name: pet-shop
description: ## Idea ACME Widget Company is a manufacturer that puts its widgets through a barrage of testing before each widget is sold.  Based on the testing, the widgets are "binned" so that widgets that meet better functionality and performance levels can be sold at a higher price (e.g. If widget 12345 can meet max performance from -50C to +150C, it is binned as a more expensive grade than if it could only meet max performance from -25C to +100C).
